paper_abstract: In this paper, we construct two classes of t x n, s(e) -disjunct matrix with subspaces in orthogonal space F(q)((2 nu+ 1)) of characteristic 2 and exhibit their disjunct properties. We also prove that the test efficiency t/n of constructions II is smaller than that of D'yachkov et al. ( J. Comput. Biol. 12: 1129- 1136, 2005).
paper_title: Two constructions of new error-correcting pooling designs from orthogonal spaces over a finite field of characteristic 2
